briefTitle: A Local Clinical Study for the Comparative Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of Angal, Lozenges [Menthol] and ANTI-ANGIN速 FORMULA, Lozenges, in Treatment of Patients With a Sore Throat
officialTitle: A Prospective, Multi-center, Open, Randomized Clinical Study in Parallel Groups, for the Comparative Evaluation of Efficacy and Safety of Angal, Lozenges [Menthol], 1 mg + 5 mg (Sandoz d.d., Slovenia), and ANTI-ANGIN速 FORMULA, Lozenges, 0,2 mg + 2 mg + 50 mg (LLC "Valeant", Russia) in Treatment of Patients With Uncomplicated Acute Infectious and Inflammatory Diseases of the Pharynx, Accompanied by a Sore Throat.
summary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate no less therapeutic efficacy and safety of the Angal, lozenges \[Menthol\], 1 mg + 5 mg (Sandoz dd, Slovenia) compared to ANTI-ANGIN速 FORMULA, lozenges, 0,2 mg + 2 mg + 50 mg (LLC "Valeant", Russia) in treatment of patients with uncomplicated acute infectious and inflammatory diseases of the pharynx, accompanied by a sore throat.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Without Sore Throat According to TSS Score
